title: [BUG] classification recipe fails to run due to Makefile comments

labels.name: area/recipes
labels.description: MLflow Recipes, Recipes APIs, Recipes configs, Recipe Templates

labels.name: has-closing-pr
labels.description: This issue has a closing PR

body:
### Issues Policy acknowledgement

- [X] I have read and agree to submit bug reports in accordance with the [issues policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)

### Willingness to contribute

Yes. I can contribute a fix for this bug independently.

### MLflow version

- Client: 2.1.1


### System information

- **Win10**:
- **3.10.8**:
- **GNU Make 3.81, installed via "Winget install GnuWin32.make"**:


### Describe the problem

I have tried the classification example from here, running with Win10 and the manually installed Make 3.81:
https://github.com/mlflow/recipes-examples

### Tracking information

_No response_

### Code to reproduce issue

- run the notebook recipes-expamples/classification/notebook/jupyter.ipynb 
- the split step fails due to this error:

```shell
process_begin: CreateProcess(NULL, # Run MLFlow Recipe step: split, ...) failed.
make (e=2): The system cannot find the file specified.

make: *** [steps/split/outputs/validation.parquet] Error 2
```

As it appears, the error is caused by the line comments starting in each of the blocks of the generated Makefile, here the step block:
# Run MLFlow Recipe step: split

as written in the file mlflow/recipes/utils/execution.py, line 527
(as well as in the other blocks).
In addition, some relative paths for the targets are filled with % in between, which causes issues.

These fixes seem to fix the issues and make the jupyter notebook to run:
https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/commit/bdea43d9a657eeaca7b302aad57ce81010710278

It would be nice to fix this.

### Stack trace

```shell
process_begin: CreateProcess(NULL, # Run MLFlow Recipe step: split, ...) failed.
make (e=2): The system cannot find the file specified.

make: *** [steps/split/outputs/validation.parquet] Error 2
```


### Other info / logs

_No response_
